ai-patthana22.3:0.2_0: (These should be expanded as in MN 5.)
ai-patthana22.3:0.3_0: Someone committed to the worst kind of skillful behavior.
ai-patthana22.3:1.1_0: No cause is a reason for speaking to cause.
ai-patthana22.3:1.1_1: No cause is a reason for attaining the unattained, the unachieved, and realizing the unrealized.
ai-patthana22.3:1.1_2: Not committed to the practice of nature.
ai-patthana22.3:1.1_4: This is the section in brief.
ai-patthana22.3:2.1_0: No to cause the reason for doing unskillful qualities to arise because of undeclared; for the sake of causes and reasons the six fields of contact gives rise to six conditions. ...
ai-patthana22.3:2.1_2: This is the section in brief.
